C# Developer Job at Trusoft Limited




        
    

        
        Trusoft Limited is a custom-services software company, specializing in the design and development of software solutions. We have built our brand around creating solutions adapted to the local market, but competing in quality in the international markets. Our products and services cut across the Educational, Medical, and Financial sectors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: C# Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: digital.talents@trusoft.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Officer / Teller",
  "description": "GTI Microfinance Limited was incorporated in August 2007 as a limited liability company and started its operations in 2008 at No. 127 Obafemi Awolowo Road, Ikeja. In October 2013, it was licensed as a State Wide Microfinance Bank and moved its Head Office to No. 4 Tinubu Street, Central Business District, Marina Lagos. Other branches are located at Mushin, Abattoir in Agege, Surulere and Arena.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer / Teller

Job Location:&nbsp;Marina, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Customer Service / Teller is responsible for providing excellent frontline service to customers by handling financial transactions accurately, responding to inquiries promptly, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
	The role requires strong attention to detail, integrity, and adherence to banking guidelines and security procedures.


Responsibilities


	Process customer transactions such as deposits, withdrawals, payments, transfers, cashing checks and other routine banking operations
	Maintain and balance cash drawer and reconcile at the beginning and end of each day.
	Verify customer identity, check transaction appropriateness, and escalate suspicious or non-standard activities.
	Adhere to internal controls, policies, regulatory requirements, security procedures.
	Maintain confidentiality of customer account information and promote positive customer relationships.
	Provide information about the bank&rsquo;s products and services, and refer customers to appropriate departments for more complex services.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree / HND with 1 - 3 years of experience.
	Experience in a microfinance bank is an added advantage.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;career@gti.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-04",
  "validThrough": "2025-11-26",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "GTI Microfinance Bank"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",

    }

Customer Service Officer / Teller Job at GTI Microfinance Bank




        
    

        
        GTI Microfinance Limited was incorporated in August 2007 as a limited liability company and started its operations in 2008 at No. 127 Obafemi Awolowo Road, Ikeja. In October 2013, it was licensed as a State Wide Microfinance Bank and moved its Head Office to No. 4 Tinubu Street, Central Business District, Marina Lagos. Other branches are located at Mushin, Abattoir in Agege, Surulere and Arena.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer / Teller

Job Location: Marina, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Customer Service / Teller is responsible for providing excellent frontline service to customers by handling financial transactions accurately, responding to inquiries promptly, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
	The role requires strong attention to detail, integrity, and adherence to banking guidelines and security procedures.


Responsibilities


	Process customer transactions such as deposits, withdrawals, payments, transfers, cashing checks and other routine banking operations
	Maintain and balance cash drawer and reconcile at the beginning and end of each day.
	Verify customer identity, check transaction appropriateness, and escalate suspicious or non-standard activities.
	Adhere to internal controls, policies, regulatory requirements, security procedures.
	Maintain confidentiality of customer account information and promote positive customer relationships.
	Provide information about the bank’s products and services, and refer customers to appropriate departments for more complex services.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree / HND with 1 - 3 years of experience.
	Experience in a microfinance bank is an added advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: career@gti.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
